<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 6+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Wand of Hawthorn](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2279)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Plant" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=125" />
<trait label="Wand" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=164" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 140 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Carved from a hawthorn branch, this wand has a smooth handle, but the shaft remains covered in bark and long thorns. Polished red stones, arranged like a cluster of berries, decorate the pommel.

**Activate** <actions string="" /> Cast a Spell;  **Frequency** once per day, plus overcharge;   **Effect** You cast [_oaken resilience_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1617) of the indicated rank, and the target sprouts long thorns like those of a hawthorn tree. While _oaken resilience_ lasts, any creature that hits the target with an unarmed Strike or otherwise touches it takes piercing damage from the thorns, with the amount determined by the wand’s type. A creature that has [engulfed](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=61) or [swallowed](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=77) the target takes this damage as well at the start of each of the target’s turns.

**Craft Requirements** Supply a casting of _Oaken Resilience_ of the appropriate rank.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
